remarks: Negation of less-than-or-equal-to expressed in terms of meet and less-than.  ( ~ nssinpss analog.)  (Contributed by NM, 5-Feb-2012.)
statement:
latnlemlt.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
latnlemlt.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
latnlemlt.s $e |- .< = ( lt ` K ) $.
latnlemlt.m $e |- ./\ = ( meet ` K ) $.
latnlemlt $p |- ( ( K e. Lat /\ X e. B /\ Y e. B ) -> ( -. X .<_ Y <-> ( X ./\ Y ) .< X ) ) $.
